Text.Page:
I know you promised to play with me, but my dad really needs help with our piglings.

They keep running away...

He's a good boy, eh?

We had a bunch of tame piglings, but they ran away when the faeries went crazy.

If you want to make yourself useful, take these pheremone darts and lure a few piglings back here.

Get their attention first, and then use the darts.
Thank you so much. We still don't have many, but this definitely helped. I hope you can help a little more.
